scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.rebuild:web: npm run clean:web && turbo run build --filter=web...
scripts.rebuild:admin: npm run clean:admin && turbo run build --filter=admin-panel...
scripts.rebuild:docs: npm run clean:docs && turbo run build --filter=docs...
scripts.rebuild:bot: npm run clean:bot && turbo run build --filter=telegram-bot...
scripts.rebuild:packages: npm run clean:packages && turbo run build --filter='./packages/*'
scripts.db:reset:web: dotenv -e apps/web/.env -- npx prisma db execute --file packages/session-management/scripts/reset/web-reset.sql --schema packages/session-management/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:reset:admin: dotenv -e apps/web/.env -- npx prisma db execute --file packages/session-management/scripts/reset/admin-reset.sql --schema packages/session-management/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:reset:all: dotenv -e apps/web/.env -- npx prisma db execute --file packages/session-management/scripts/reset/full-reset.sql --schema packages/session-management/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:seed:usdt: dotenv -e apps/web/.env -- npx prisma db execute --file packages/session-management/scripts/seed-usdt-wallets.sql --schema packages/session-management/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:seed:operator: dotenv -e apps/web/.env -- npx prisma db execute --file packages/session-management/scripts/seed-default-operator.sql --schema packages/session-management/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:seed:banks: dotenv -e apps/web/.env -- npx prisma db execute --file packages/session-management/scripts/seed-uah-banks.sql --schema packages/session-management/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:seed:test-orders: dotenv -e apps/web/.env -- npx prisma db execute --file packages/session-management/scripts/seed-test-orders-spudymun.sql --schema packages/session-management/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:seeds: npm run db:seed:usdt && npm run db:seed:operator && npm run db:seed:banks
scripts.db:clean:usdt: dotenv -e apps/web/.env -- npx prisma db execute --file packages/session-management/scripts/clean-reseed-usdt.sql --schema packages/session-management/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:reset:usdt: dotenv -e apps/web/.env -- npx prisma db execute --file packages/session-management/scripts/reset-usdt-to-available.sql --schema packages/session-management/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:push: dotenv -e apps/web/.env -- npx prisma db push --schema packages/session-management/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate: dotenv -e apps/web/.env -- npx prisma migrate dev --schema packages/session-management/prisma/schema.prisma
